claude-3-haiku-bedrock.feature: Claude 3 Haiku by Anthropic via AWS Bedrock - fastest and most cost-effective model in the Claude 3 family. Optimized for quick responses and high-volume tasks with excellent efficiency.

llama-3-70b-bedrock.feature: Llama 3 70B Instruct by Meta via AWS Bedrock - powerful open-source model with 70 billion parameters. Excellent for complex reasoning, code generation, and multilingual tasks.

gpt-4o-mini.feature: GPT-4o Mini by OpenAI - affordable and intelligent small model for fast, lightweight tasks. Optimized for cost-effective performance with strong reasoning capabilities.

gpt-4o.feature: GPT-4o by OpenAI - high-intelligence flagship model for complex, multi-step tasks. Provides advanced reasoning and comprehensive language understanding.

gpt-3.5-turbo.feature: GPT-3.5 Turbo by OpenAI - fast, inexpensive model for simple tasks. Excellent for straightforward queries and high-volume applications.
